recipe.ingredients: - fresh peaches (sliced, pits removed): 2 medium - low-fat Greek yogurt: 1 cup - almond milk (unsweetened): 1/2 cup - ice cubes: 1/2 cup - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - ground cinnamon: 1/4 teaspoon - fresh mint (for garnish, optional): a few leaves
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Wash and slice peaches, removing the pits. 2. Blend: In a blender, combine sliced peaches, Greek yogurt, almond milk, ice cubes, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve: Pour the smoothie into glasses and garnish with fresh mint leaves if using. 4. Enjoy: Enjoy this refreshing smoothie chilled, perfect for a summer treat.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 26g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Sodium: 78mg, Saturated Fat: 1g, Total Fat: 2g, Protein: 11g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 20g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 340 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Fresh Peaches: 120 calories (approximately 60 calories per medium peach) Low-fat Greek Yogurt: 150 calories for 1 cup Almond Milk: 15 calories per 1/2 cup (unsweetened) Ice Cubes: Negligible Vanilla Extract: 12 calories per teaspoon Ground Cinnamon: 2 calories per 1/4 teaspoon Fresh Mint: Negligible - Serving People: 2
